course_description: This is the first term of a theoretical treatment of the physics of solids. Topics covered include:

Free Electron: Fermi Sea

Crystalline Lattices
Bloch's Theorem
Band Structure: OPW, APW, Tight-binding
Survey of Periodic Table




How to Construct Lattice Potential?

Pseudo-potential
Electron-electron Interaction
Density Functional Theory
Screening, Lindhard Function
Linear Response Theory




Methods of Testing Band Structures

Semiclassical Equation of Motion
de Haas van Alphen
Quantum Hall Effect




Beyond Band Theory: Mott Insulator


Phonons


Electron-phonon Interaction


Superconductivity

BCS Theory
Flux Quantization
Vortices and Type II Superconductors
Josephson Effect
